column5: Luxury Updated Historic home built in 1917 in heart of Bishop Arts District + close to Convention Center + Downtown, on quiet neighborhood street! Just 2 blocks to street car to Union Station. Walk to Oak Cliff's best restaurants, bars, galleries and shops. Garage parking included. Hardwood floors, open kitchen floor plan. Granite Countertops in Kitchen and Bath. Close to Downtown Dallas, Uptown, Convention Center, American Airlines Center, Design District, Dallas Zoo, easy access AT&T Center
